title: Mackerel spring rolls
ingredients: ['4 fresh mackerel fillets', '100g rice noodles', '15 rice paper spring roll wrappers', 'a few leaves of lettuce', '1/2 cucumber, halved and thinly sliced lengthways', '1 bunch fresh coriander', '1 handful beansprouts', '2 spring onions, thinly sliced', 'Marinade', '2 cloves garlic', '2 Thai chillies, stemmed', '1 stalk lemongrass, chopped', '125ml soy sauce', '2 limes, juiced']
